trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> private key of the <see langword="<KeyInfo>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Representa la clave privada <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> del elemento <see langword="<KeyInfo>" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> class represents the `<KeyInfo>` element, which contains a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> public key.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> clase representa el `<KeyInfo>` elemento, que contiene un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> clave pública.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> to identify the public key that corresponds to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> private key that was used to create the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> para identificar la clave pública que corresponde a la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> clave privada que se usó para crear la firma digital.

trans-unit.source: If a key is not explicitly supplied to the constructor, a new <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> key pair is randomly generated.
trans-unit.target: Si una clave no se proporciona explícitamente al constructor, un nuevo <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> par de claves se genera aleatoriamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> class is used with XML signatures.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> clase se utiliza con las firmas XML.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the W3C specification, see http://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de la especificación W3C, vea http://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> class in XML encryption to create a detached signature.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> clase en el cifrado XML para crear una firma desasociada.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> class in XML encryption to create an envelope signature.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> clase en el cifrado XML para crear una firma con doble cifrado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" /> class with a new, randomly-generated <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> public key.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" /> con una nueva clave pública <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> generada aleatoriamente.

trans-unit.source: When creating a new <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> key, this constructor uses the default implementation of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> as defined by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig> class.
trans-unit.target: Al crear un nuevo <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> clave, este constructor utiliza la implementación predeterminada de <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> tal como se define por la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig> clase.

trans-unit.source: The instance of an implementation of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> class that holds the public key.
trans-unit.target: Instancia de una implementación de la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> que contiene la clave pública.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> public key.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" /> con la clave pública <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> class in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> clase en el cifrado XML.

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML representation of a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve la representación XML de un elemento <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" />.

trans-unit.source: The XML representation of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Representación XML del elemento <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" />.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to output XML for a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilice este método para generar XML para un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key value represented by a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el valor de clave que representa un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />.

trans-unit.source: The public key represented by a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Clave pública que representa un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />.

trans-unit.source: This property represents the DSA key used to sign the XML.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad representa la clave DSA utilizada para firmar el código XML.

trans-unit.source: The XML element to load the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" /> state from.
trans-unit.target: Elemento XML a partir del cual se carga el estado de <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" />.

trans-unit.source: Loads a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" /> state from an XML element.
trans-unit.target: Carga un estado de la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" /> a partir de un elemento XML.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to add XML elements to a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> object.
trans-unit.target: Este método se puede utilizar para agregar elementos XML a una <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El parámetro <paramref name="value" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" /> XML element.
trans-unit.target: El parámetro <paramref name="value" /> no es un elemento XML <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue" /> válido.
